body:
I started an install and it failed with lots of text to the screeen and a pointer to a file for specifically what failed but no indication of a simple way to report back to the Spack developers all relevent information. For example what all my compiler and configuration options are etc. Perhaps on failure Spack could generate a list of exactly what files I should include in the Issue report? Maybe also generate files that we should submitt with a .txt extension since github issues don't like attachments with a .out extenstion. So you don't have to keep coming back to users and asking for more information? Perhaps you have this and I couldn't find it? 

Anyways, the specific failure I got was 
###### ################################################################## 100.0%

==> Staging archive: /Users/barrysmith/Src/spack/var/spack/stage/openblas-0.2.19-ys4mqarh3gjib36khldodtkpcl4dicix/v0.2.19.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /Users/barrysmith/Src/spack/var/spack/stage/openblas-0.2.19-ys4mqarh3gjib36khldodtkpcl4dicix
==> Applied patch make.patch
==> Building openblas
==> Error: Command exited with status 1:
'/Users/barrysmith/Src/spack/lib/spack/env/cc' '-o' 'check' 'test_cblas_dgemm.o' '-L/Users/barrysmith/Src/spack/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/clang-8.0.0-apple/openblas-0.2.19-ys4mqarh3gjib36khldodtkpcl4dicix/lib' '-llapack' '-lblas' '-lpthread'

See build log for details:
  /private/var/folders/c1/ldz_dt8n2r3dtwv_chp5pfr40000gn/T/barrysmith/spack-stage/spack-stage-bLlt6r/OpenBLAS-0.2.19/spack-build.out

I've attached the spack-build.out file 
[spack-build.out.txt](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/491900/spack-build.out.txt)

Note that the directory /Users/barrysmith/Src/spack/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/clang-8.0.0-apple/openblas-0.2.19-ys4mqarh3gjib36khldodtkpcl4dicix does not exist I don't know if this is because you delete it automatically on failure or if it never existed?

Also attaching ~/.spack/compilers.yaml and ~/.spack/packages.yaml (again note the nuisance factor of having to rename them to attach to github issues. Perhaps your "error report generator" could put all the information into a file .txt  and tell me about the file on failure so that I could easily attach?
[compilers.yaml.txt](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/491901/compilers.yaml.txt)
[packages.yaml.txt](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/491902/packages.yaml.txt)

If you need anything more just let me know.
title: Spack processes/tools to make reporting failures easier
